author: Jon Fingas
title: Apple shares more details of how COVID-19 contact tracing will work
description: Apple and Google shared a fair amount about their COVID-19 contact tracing plans with their joint announcement, but they still left some gaps. However, Apple has been willing to fill in a few of the blanks in a follow-up with The Verge. The company is aware o…
